content:
bjorn3 commented on issue #3811:

I believe this includes the code for 0.34 despite being on the 0.33 branch.

peterhuene commented on issue #3811:

We apparently can't run the bump-patch script for two different target branches at the same time because only a single source branch is used.

Closing this for now and once 0.34.x is done I'll kick this off again.
